description: Try our easy to follow Crab & Noodle Asian Wraps recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Crab & Noodle Asian Wraps Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 fresh root ginger, peeled and grated, 1.5cm piece

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the noodles according to the packet instructions. Drain, then refresh under cold running water.

Mix together all the other ingredients, except the ricepaper wrappers, in a large bowl. Add the noodles and toss to mix. Cover and leave to stand for 10 minutes to allow the flavours to develop, then transfer to a serving dish.
To serve, ricepapers with some of the crab and noodle mixture and roll up to eat, allowing 4 wraps per person.
